"CB3"	"CB4"	"CF2"	"CM3"	"JR2"	"NG1"	"NG2"	"PP3"	"PP4"	"SB8"	"FUSION"
>>> [np.median(pd01.ix[:,i]) for i in np.arange(1,12)]
[82.640000000000001, 82.030000000000001, 76.349999999999994, 76.349999999999994, 67.530000000000001, 76.439999999999998, 71.510000000000005, 76.390000000000001, 76.129999999999995, 8.0, 83.120000000000005]
>>> [np.std(pd01.ix[:,i]) for i in np.arange(1,12)]
[20.347534776541892, 20.045441402705038, 19.324285072547006, 19.324285072547006, 18.654513185525875, 19.512587711582267, 19.436434215972522, 19.943675374769509, 20.523857227555627, 7.9218634533834225, 18.799484696049642]
>>> [np.mean(pd01.ix[:,i]) for i in np.arange(1,12)]
